dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Hi Vincent, if you have any questions about liberal arts, you can ask me! This is your weakness, I hope I can help you.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Thank you very much! You can also ask me questions about mathematics or physics!

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: This is what helping each other means!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Today is really a fruitful day!

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: yes! It feels like it’s really efficient for us to study together.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: It's time to go home, let's go.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Oh! Do you want to study together on the phone tonight? It’s a virtual study room!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: wow! Of course! When you are ready, you can send me a message. By the way, there is also a link.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Okay, okay, then let’s set it at 7 p.m.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Emm. . . My mother is very strict with me. In order to avoid her nagging, I'm afraid this method won't work.

dialogues.name: Yvonne
dialogues.content: Ah~ I see, okay…Ah~I see, okay...
